description.diamond-pearl:
The user whips up a
turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed
of all party Pokémon
for three turns.
description.platinum:
The user whips up a
turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed
of all party Pokémon
for three turns.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user whips up a
turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed
of all party Pokémon
for three turns.
description.black-white:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon
for four turns.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon
for four turns.
description.x-y:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed stat of the user and
its allies for four turns.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed stat of the user and
its allies for four turns.
description.sun-moon:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups
the Speed stat of the user and its allies for
four turns.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups
the Speed stat of the user and its allies for
four turns.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups
the Speed stat of the user and its allies for
four turns.
description.sword-shield:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups
the Speed stats of the user and its allies for
four turns.

effect.full: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user's side of the field have their original Speed doubled.  This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.shortEffect: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
